Devs to help your child learn, play, and grow

They’ll have fun with characters they love, and you’ll rest easy knowing all our apps nurture their curiosity and creativity.

Start having fun now with our top picks.

Alphabet Adventure
Puzzle Pals
Math Safari
Color Quest

Your kids are restless and you could do with 5 minutes to yourself, but you want to give them constructive screen time that still feels like a treat.

That’s why we make apps for kids that engage them in well-rounded activities designed to nurture them and help them grow. You’ll get peace of mind seeing your kids learn and have fun at the same time.

Children are constantly learning from the world around them, including their digital environment

We responsibly design our apps so your child gets to enjoy the fun of screen time while also developing healthy digital habits at a young age.

Learn more about how we design our apps

Just the right balance between
fun and learning

Our apps bring together sound pedagogy, exciting characters, and free-form play experience.

You’ll love our apps for their educational value. Your child will love them for the rewarding games and familiar characters.

We started making apps for kids over 10 years ago. Since then, our apps have been installed over 200 million times.

Our team includes passionate professionals who excel in child focused fields. Many of us are parents too. We are often guided by our own children in the way we design our apps. As parents, we know that the stakes are especially high these days when it comes to learning in our early years. We promise you that we will always be at the cutting edge of educational innovation. You’ll aways be sure our games and characters have integrity. They engage, educate, and entertain all at once.
